SEARCH
Package org.zssn.escaperoom

Class Room

java.lang.Object
org.zssn.escaperoom.Room
public class Room extends Object
Room class is used to create the rooms of the game. Each room has 4 walls and each wall can have items.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field

    • Room

      public Room(int n, int d, String nam, Item[] NItems, Item[] EItems, Item[] SItems, Item[] WItems)
      Room class constructor
      Parameters:
      n - number of the room
      d - number of doors in the room
      nam - name of the room
      NItems - items in the north wall
      EItems - items in the east wall
      SItems - items in the south wall
      WItems - items in the west wall
